titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation whereas His Majesty by his proclamation of the first day of March last ... prohibited the setting to sea any ships or vessels to or for any parts or places beyond the seas ... doth hereby declare ... that the said proclamation, and the prohibition, and every other clause, matter, and thing therein contained, shall from henceforth cease and determine ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first words of text.
"Given at Our Court at Whitehall the Twenty sixth day of April 1665, in the Seventeenth year of His Majesties Reign."
Reproduction of original in: Huntington Library.
